articles.description: CHENNAI: As the vaccination drive in the country continues to speed up, it is imperative to increase the production of Covid vaccines as well.
articles.content: CHENNAI: As the vaccination drive in the country continues to speed up, it is imperative to increase the production of Covid vaccines as well. Vaccination of people between the ages of 18 and 45 has … [+626 chars]
